song.title: Come Thou Long Expected Jesus
song.lyrics:
[V1] .D Bm G A D Bm G - A - D Come thou long-expected Jesus, Born to set thy people free .D Bm G A D Bm G - A D From our sins and fears release us; let us find our rest in Thee .D G D Bm A Israel’s strength and consolation, Hope of all the earth thou art .D A Bm A G D/F# A D Dear desire of ev’ry nation, joy of every longing heart
[V2] .D Bm G A D Bm G - A D Born thy people to deliver, Born a child and yet a king .D Bm G A D Bm G - A D Born to reign in us forever, Now thy gracious kingdom bring .D G D Bm A By thine own eternal spirit; rule in all our hearts alone .D A Bm A G D/F# A D By thine all sufficient merit, Raise us to thy glorious throne
